The '''Carassius Auratus Chapter''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: Dreamlike Timelessness==
{{Main|Dreamlike Timelessness}}
{{Description|With the Naganohara Fireworks Show just around the corner, everyone is getting excited and the fireworks girl is getting busy.<br />But what is the place of a transitory flicker of flame in a nation that champions eternity?<br />If you have a moment to spare, pray stop and see for yourself. Some things may exist for only an instant, but their meaning endures for all time.}}
# [[The Firework Girl's Strange Stories]]
# [[Expectations Not to Be Betrayed]]
# [[A Sliver of Hope]]
# [[Together Under the Fireworks]]
